title.rendered: PT USHA will be the first Woman President of the IOA

content.rendered:
Legendary Indian sprinter PT Usha is about to emerge as the first-ever woman president of the Indian Olympic Association (IOA). She emerged because of the lone candidate for the submission within side the December 10 elections. PT Usha is a Golden Girl in Athletics for India. More than one Asian Games gold medallist filed her nomination papers for the process on Sunday at the side of her crew for the diverse posts.

The 58-year-antique Usha filed her nomination papers for the pinnacle process on November 27 at the side of her crew for the diverse posts. The cut-off date to report the nomination papers for the Indian Olympic Association elections ended on November 27, 2022.

IOA – Indian Olympic Association

The Indian Olympic Association is the body structure for deciding on athletes to symbolize India at the Olympic Games and Asian Games. In addition to different global athletic meets, and dealing with the Indian groups at those events. The affiliation become created in 1927.

The IOA polls can be held to go with one President, one senior vice-president, vice-presidents (one girl and one male), joint secretaries (one girl and one male), six different govt council members, out of which (one male and one girl) will be from the elected SOMs.

The end date to report the nomination papers for the IOA elections ended on November 27, 2022. The IOA elections returning officer Umesh Singha did now no longer acquire any nominations on November 25 and 26 however 24 applicants filed nominations for diverse posts on November 27.

There can be contests for one submission of Vice President (girl), and joint secretary (girl). There had been 12 applicants withinside the fray for 4 govt council members.


The Past success story of India’s Golden Girl: PT USHA

A pinnacle sprinter in her heyday has additionally been elected as one of the eight sportspersons of exquisite merit (SOM) with the aid of using the Athletes Commission of the IOA, making her an electoral university member.PT Usha turns into the primary Olympian and primary global medallist to go the IOA in its 95-year-antique history.

She ruled Indian and Asian athletics for 2 a long time earlier than retiring in 2000 with a bagful of global medals.
PT Usha is the primary sportsperson to symbolize India and emerge as the IOA Chief considering Maharaja Yadavindra Singh. He performed a Test Match in 1934. He became additionally the 0.33 IOA President who held workplace from 1938 to 1960.
Fondly called the Payyoli Express, PT Usha is being visible as a candidate of the ruling Bhartiya Janata Party which had nominated her as a Rajya Sabha Member in July 2022. She is one of the maxima-adorned Indian athletes, having received eleven medals, which include four Golds in the Asian Games from 1982 to 1994.

She received all 4 Gold Medals withinside the 1986 Seoul Asian Games. She got a hundred m and 200m medals withinside the 1982 New Delhi Asian Games. She additionally received out-of-the-ordinary 23 medals, which include 14 Gold, withinside the Asian Championships from 1983 to 1998, together in 100m, 200m, 400m hurdles, 4x100m relay, and 4x400m relay.
